alert.note: Alert for Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Brazoria and central Matagorda Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near South Texas Nuclear Plant. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bay City, Palacios, South Texas Nuclear Plant, Sargent, Van Vleck and Wadsworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Matagorda; Inland Brazoria; Inland Matagorda
